title: CAF attends the Launch of new COMESA Regulations in Zambia
desc: The Confédération Africaine de Football (“CAF”) attended the launch of the new Regulations of the Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) underscoring CAF’s commitment to strong governance, responsible commercial engagement, and regional economic cooperation.

title: Exhibitor Success Story
desc: Razer showcased its expanding AI ecosystem at CES®️ 2026, highlighting intelligent hardware, immersive innovation, and next-generation experiences shaping the future of gaming and interactive technology.

title: Liam Rosenior reveals Chelsea held team meeting after Wesley Fofana racial abuse
desc: Chelsea manager Liam Rosenior has revealed that the squad held a team meeting in the wake of the vile racist abuse Wesley Fofana received in a bid to help the group move from the incident.

title: San Mateo County Health Announces Potential Measles Exposure
desc: San Mateo County, Calif. – San Mateo County Health is working with Santa Clara County Public Health to notify the public of a confirmed case of measles in the area. The case is an adult who recently returned from international travel. The individual, a Santa Clara County resident, was vaccinated and is now isolating at home.

title: Blues' Latest Asking Price for Robert Thomas Revealed: And It Is Massive
